2023-04-17 18:03:40,475 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Started hunting
2023-04-17 18:03:40,475 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Discovering Open Kubernetes Services
2023-04-17 18:03:40,494 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found vulnerability "Read access to pod's service account token" in Local to Pod (kube-hunter-z7s95)
2023-04-17 18:03:40,495 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found vulnerability "Access to pod's secrets" in Local to Pod (kube-hunter-z7s95)
2023-04-17 18:03:55,579 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found open service "Etcd" at 10.244.1.9:2379
2023-04-17 18:03:55,699 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found open service "Etcd" at 10.244.1.8:2379
2023-04-17 18:03:55,785 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found open service "Kubelet API" at 10.244.1.1:10250
2023-04-17 18:04:03,247 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found open service "API Server" at 10.96.0.1:443
2023-04-17 18:04:03,297 INFO kube_hunter.modules.report.collector Found vulnerability "Access to API using service account token" in 10.96.0.1:443
